column1: Smoque BBQ////I also think that as far as thick sauces go
column2: Smoque's got one of my fav's.  It's not the syrupy sweet super thick sauce that you wind up buying at the supermarket
column3: nor is it the thin vinegar and mustard based sauce of my childhood.  It's it own beast of delicious tangy flavor with a hint of sweetness.  I like to tear down my rack of ribs and dip just a bit in the sauce
column4: so that I get a hint of the sweetness to accentuate the savory.
